int init_key_handler (  ) 

Function:
init_key_handler
Description:
Create a buffer to communicate with the kernel module.
Inputs:
  • None
Outputs:
  • int: Status
    • 0 = OK
    • <0 = Error

int key_handler (  ) 

Function:
key_handler
Description:
When a session is initialized, the primary P3 system sends the initial data and control keys. Get these keys from the initialization message and provide them to the kernel module using the communication buffer.
Inputs:
  • None
Outputs:
  • int: Status
    • 0 = OK
    • <0 = Error
